content: उच्चयः {@--1@} A collection, heap, multitude; रूपोच्चयेन <ls>Ś. 2. 9</ls>; पदोच्चयः <ls>S. D. 2</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> शिलोच्चय also. {@--2@} Gathering, collecting (flowers &c.); पुष्पोच्चयं नाटयति <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 61.</ls> {@--3@} The knot of a woman's (wearing) garment (नीविबंध); <ls>Ki. 8. 15</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 8.">51.</ls> {@--4@} Nīvāra rice (collected by winnowing). {@--5@} Prosperity, rise; उच्चयापचयौ <ls>H. 3. 133.</ls> {@--6@} The opposite side of a triangle.
